name: Planetary Defence Force
author: guitarninja
lore:
In the vast and diverse galaxy of the sci-fi universe, countless worlds inhabited by various species and civilizations faced a common threat â€“ the looming shadow of interstellar conflicts and predatory forces seeking to exploit their resources and subjugate their populations. As civilizations began to explore and colonize other planets, they realized the need for a unified defense against such threats.

In response, representatives from multiple advanced civilizations came together to form the Interstellar Coalition for Planetary Defense (ICPD). This alliance recognized the importance of defending their collective interests and protecting the sovereignty of their member worlds. To implement this vision, they established a joint military force known as the Planetary Defense Force (PDF).

The PDF was not a singular organization, but a network of militias, each based on their respective planets, while operating under the larger umbrella of the ICPD. This structure allowed the PDF to retain a strong connection to local cultures and customs, providing each world with the autonomy to shape their defense forces according to their unique needs.

The core values of the PDF were unity, cooperation, and the pursuit of peace through strength. They believed that by standing together, they could deter potential aggressors and foster an environment of interstellar cooperation and diplomacy. The PDF's primary objective was to ensure the safety and security of member worlds and to act as a swift and decisive response to any threats that might arise.

Over time, the PDF became renowned for its rigorous training programs and cutting-edge technology. Each member world contributed its own expertise, leading to the development of diverse military strategies and advanced weaponry. This exchange of knowledge and resources further strengthened the bonds between the civilizations, creating a shared identity and fostering a sense of camaraderie among the PDF's ranks.

While the PDF primarily focused on defense, they were not an isolationist force. They actively engaged in peacekeeping missions, disaster relief efforts, and exploration endeavors. By demonstrating their commitment to aiding their member worlds in times of peace, the PDF solidified its reputation as guardians of not just the physical safety of the planets but also as stewards of harmony and cooperation in the galaxy.

As time went on, the Planetary Defense Force faced numerous challenges, from external threats posed by marauding space pirates to internal debates about balancing individual planetary interests with the greater good of the alliance. However, their shared vision and commitment to each other's well-being helped them overcome these hurdles.

In the annals of history, the Planetary Defense Force emerged as a symbol of strength through unity, serving as a testament to the power of cooperation and the triumph of a collective spirit over adversity. Their legacy lived on, inspiring generations of defenders and acting as a guiding light for a peaceful and prosperous future in the ever-expanding universe.

commander.name: Company Commander
commander.description: Foot infantry commander of the planetary defense force.

mounted_commander.name: Mounted Commander
mounted_commander.description: Mounted commander of the planetary defense force.

stormtrooper_commander.name: Stormtrooper Commander
stormtrooper_commander.description: Foot infantry commander of the elite storm troopers.

commissar.name: Commissar
commissar.description: A field officer assigned to keep soldiers motivated and in line.

psychic.name: Psychic
psychic.description: A trained psychic adept at casting powers and supporting troops.

conscript_squad.name: Conscript Squad
conscript_squad.description: An inexperienced squad of infantry sent to the frontline with little training.

infantry_squad.name: Infantry Squad
infantry_squad.description: The backbone of the planetary defense force.

void_infantry_squad.name: Void Infantry Squad
void_infantry_squad.description: A heavily armored squad that exchanges specialist weaponry for powerful rifles.

veteran_squad.name: Veteran Infantry Squad
veteran_squad.description: A more experienced infantry squad that has seen combat and survived.

command_squad.name: Command Squad
command_squad.description: A smaller infantry squad used to support a commanding officer.

heavy_weapon_squad.name: Heavy Weapons Squad
heavy_weapon_squad.description: A squad of heavy weapons teams loaded out to deal with a variety of targets.

specialist_squad.name: Specialist Squad
specialist_squad.description: An infantry team kitted out with several special weapons to serve a specific purpose.

engineer_squad.name: Combat Engineer Squad
engineer_squad.description: A squad kitted out for close-range engagements and destroying emplacements.

sniper_team.name: Sniper Team
sniper_team.description: An infantry squad loaded out to hunt high value targets.

stormtroopers.name: Stormtroopers
stormtroopers.description: Specially equipped and elite trained stormtrooper infantry.

rider_squad.name: Rider Squad
rider_squad.description: A squad of soldiers mounted on either horseback or motorcycle for more mobility.

ogres.name: Ogres
ogres.description: A squad of super-strong large mutated creatures.

light_gunship.name: Light Transport Gunship
light_gunship.description: A light gunship with sliding doors for troop transport.

heavy_gunship.name: Heavy Gunship
heavy_gunship.description: A heavy gunship with a variety of weapon options.

light_apc.name: APC
light_apc.description: A light transport of the planetary defense force.

void_apc.name: Void APC
void_apc.description: A heavy transport designed for operations in the vacuum of space.

command_battle_tank.name: Battle Tank Commander
command_battle_tank.description: A main line battle tank commander.

heavy_battle_tank.name: Heavy Battle Tank
heavy_battle_tank.description: A larger battle tank with more powerful weapon options.

support_vehicle.name: Support Vehicle
support_vehicle.description: A support vehicle with multiple roles from artillery to anti-air.

light_assault_tank.name: Light Assault Tank
light_assault_tank.description: A light tank vehicle with multiple assault roles.

super_heavy_battle_tank.name: Super Heavy Battle Tank
super_heavy_battle_tank.description: A titanic battle tank with a variety of weapon options.

super_heavy_battle_transport.name: Super Heavy Transport Tank
super_heavy_battle_transport.description: A titanic battle tank with an extended deck to transport troops

armored_truck.name: Armored Truck
armored_truck.description: An armored transport of the planetary defense force.

armored_stormtrooper_truck.name: Armored Stormtrooper Truck
armored_stormtrooper_truck.description: An armored transport of the planetary defense force.

high_command.name: High Command
high_command.description: This model may be used for Field Order one additional time.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.description: Target friendly unit within 12" gets +1 Save the next time it is attacked.

bolster.name: Bolster
bolster.description: Target friendly unit within 12" gets +1 Courage until the end of the round.

crush.name: Crush
crush.description: Target enemy unit within 12" takes 2 hits with AP(6).

dig_in.name: Dig In
dig_in.description: Use when a unit is targeted by an enemy. If it did not move this round, that unit is treated as if it was in cover.
dig_in.flavor: Imperial Defense force soldiers are trained to take the best advantage of cover they can to survive.

field_order.name: Field Order
field_order.description: Use when activating a unit. Choose a friendly _Leader_ model within 6" that could be attached to this unit. This unit is treated as having that Leader attached for this activation. This may be used once per _Leader_ per round.
field_order.flavor: Field officers need to be flexible in the heat of battle to lead other units to victory.

patch_up.name: Patch Up
patch_up.description: Use when activating a unit. That unit may restore one Wound.

strategist.name: Brilliant Strategist
strategist.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Brilliant Strategist.
strategist.flavor: This model has an adept strategic mind.

high_command.name: High Command
high_command.description: Upgrade one Leader model with High Command.
high_command.flavor: This model has been promoted to a higher position in the defense force ranks.

savage_claw.name: The Savage Claw
savage_claw.description: Replace one Leader's Energy Fist(X) with The Savage Claw(X)
savage_claw.flavor: Torn from the body of a savage orc warlord, this claw is particularly deadly.
